betterquesting:10.desc:8:
You'll be doing a lot of mining as you level up your Tinkers' tools (and the ores you can mine), so why not craft some specialised backpacks to carry more stuff! The two you will want for mining are the §1Miner's Backpack§r (for ores) and the §9Digger's Backpack§r (for cobblestones).

If you don't have enough string, you can grow some §k§r§l§r§dCotton§r from Natura or §dFlax§r from Actually Additions.

You can §3Shift + Right Click§r while holding the backpack to change its mode.
- §6Normal§r automatically picks up allowed items
- §6Locked§r disables auto-pickup
- §6Receiving§r collects eligible items from other inventories
- §6Resupply§r automatically refills a stack of an item in your hotbar or inventory as you use it.

You can also §3Shift + Right Click§r a chest with the backpack to empty it.
